message: Hello
Ouch. Yeah, I'm buying a new house in about an hour, so my bank account's about to be emptied anyway
Hey! Nah, not here, but just got off an annoying phone call and this is a welcome diversion
SO let's pool our money and buy ourselves a sports franchise

excellent, congratulations
thanks!
Testing this out as an option for Social PoC?
This is pretty good.
No, I jus tlike it.
I just like it, that is.
Clean and easy to use, that's good. I didn't read enough about the privacy options though, so I'll need to do that
is this generated through a hastag, or is it a specific room/topic that you have control over?
Well, it's all FB & twitter friends, right? I think we're going to just move towards all friendships on the social graph being 100% open, and then professional, political, etc. graphs being closed.
Basically, we'll have the FB model & the linkedin model.
makes sense
I went to groups -> create groups.
"Create a new group"
Cool. seems pretty simple

http://twitter.com/josh_thole

not much there so far, but it'll be interesting to se what he posts once Ps and Cs report, the season starts, etc
and to see if any other players follow
I bet they will. I wish they could tweet from the dugout.
that would be great. someone will violate that policy; let's just hope it's worth it and results in something  entertaining or insightful

See you tomorrow.
I heard you were sick. But Steven says you were here this morning. Fred says you are home.
